game.title: Rescue the Lost Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the clutches of the evil dragon.
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by an evil dragon and taken to its lair in the mountains. You must rescue her before it's too late.
game.reward: A large sum of gold and the princess's gratitude.

task.description: Search for the dragon's lair in the mountains carefully.
Confront the powerful dragon at its lair.
Free the princess from the dragon's clutches.

task.objective: Return the princess to the castle
task.description: Transport the rescued princess safely back to the castle.
